mapper.select: SELECT c.*, s.name AS authorName, CASE WHEN c.depth = 0 THEN c.commentId ELSE c.parentId END as groupId FROM Comments c LEFT JOIN sys_empref s ON c.userId = s.id WHERE c.postId = #{postId} AND c.deleteYn = 'N' ORDER BY groupId, c.depth, c.createdAt;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comments (postId, userId, content, parentId, depth, createdAt, updatedAt, deleteYn) VALUES ( #{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASE WHEN #{parentId} IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE (SELECT depth FROM Comments WHERE commentId = #{parentId}) + 1 END, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'N' )
